text: The Casino Marina del Sol is the largest casino in Chile. It is in the city of Talcahuano. It opened in 2005 under a Chilean law allowing casinos. It contains a casino, hotel, gym, spa, disco, museum and car park. ==Related pages== * Greater Concepción == Other websites == * Casino Marina del Sol Category:Buildings and structures in Chile Category:21st-century establishments in Chile Category:2005 establishments in South America Category:Casinos Category:Concepción Province, Chile
title: Casino Marina del Sol
